description: Boots worn by Belenus, healing God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Belenus, of three siblings, spent his days attending the sick animals of Fomoria's fields. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

name: Arisen Cursed Bormana's Mantle
description: Light armor of Bormana, warrior water Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Bormana tended the Sumner crops with castle-sized barrels of water, a true testiment to her strength. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

name: Arisen Cursed Caticatona Cuirass
description: Large heavy armor of Caticatona, leader of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Caticatona, the armored Water Goddess, stood tall against Morrigan's acolytes, but ultimately fell by their staff and sword. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

name: Arisen Cursed Caturix's Robe
description: Heavy, armored, robe of Caturix, war God and leader of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Caturix fought Morrigan to the bitter end, ultimately succumbing to the curse in battle. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

name: Arisen Cursed Clota's Garb
description: Light garb of Clota, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Clota and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

description: Earthen polearm of Boulder, the Earthen Legion elite. It has a high chance of stunning an opponent.

name: Bow of the Chimera
description: A powerful bow forged of the remains of a Chimera. Using this weapon may cause one to fill with immense rage, inflicting the Berserk status.

name: Bow of Typhon
description: A superb bow forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

description: A small weapon carried by a Clurichaun. Although it is not suitable for your primary hand, it will fit as an obscure off-hand.

Caticatona, the armored Water Goddess, stood tall against Morrigan's acolytes, but ultimately fell by their staff and sword. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

name: Cavestone

name: Cliffside Cuirass
description: Chapter VI: Illuyanka then raised walls of stone to frame this new land from the raging seas and winds. The cliffs and shores can be seen from afar, and her mighty armor will surely make one feel as they are made of the cliffs themselves. It will occasionally protect you from hits that take 100% of your maximum HP.

name: Clota's Garb
description: Light garb of Clota, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Clota and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

name: Clurichaun Arrows
description: A quiver of arrows that are coated in a thick poison. Carrying these arrows in your off-hand gives the chance to poison or blight an opponent.

name: Clurichaun Soul Blade

description: Chestplate forged of the remains of a mighty Cockatrice. It grants its wearer immunity from petrification.

name: Coffee
description: The nectar of gods.

description: Chapter I: These lands were created by the Great Dragons: 8 deities formed by the wants and wishes of humankind. Lotan was the first to mend the earth, coiling rock from the planet's core to create the foundation of life. Her shield will greatly decrease the damage taken when defending in battle.

description: A bag for coins. Slightly raises gold earned.

description: Proof of trials complete for the Fomorian house of Autumna. Use this item to summon a mighty projection.

name: Crimson Snapper
description: Ouch! It bit you.

name: Crooked Shotel
description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This crooked shotel is one of them.

name: Crossbow
description: A hunter's crossbow.

description: Crude armor made of the remains of a crow. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

name: Crowsong
description: Cursed lute played by the sisters of Morrigan. It can grant one additional defenses while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

name: Crucifix
description: A staff of the occult. Boasts strong magic power, but can also be used as a weapon. Additionally It heals its wielder when dealing damage.

description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the armor of one.

description: A strange eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats.

name: Crystal Halberd
description: A crystalline polearm carried by the most enlightened of travelers. It is well suited for adornment.

name: Crystal Staff
description: A magical crystalline staff carried by the most enlightened travelers. It is well suited for adornment.

name: Crystalis
description: A ceremonial sword of enlightened royalty. It can protect one from having their stats lowered and is well suited for adornment.

name: Cure-all
description: A bitter green elixir that heals poison, bleeding, blight, frozen, burning, paralysis, sleep, blindness, or rot.

name: Cursed Aengus Og's Lute
description: Second lute of Aengus Og, famous Bard of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Aengus Og sang tales of Fomoria's conquests, but was quick to flee the lands when the great curse took haste. Does he still sing of conquest, we wonder? While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

name: Cursed Artio's Hide
description: Bear hide armor of Artio, bear Goddess of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Artio, of three siblings, spent her days taming wild bears. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

name: Cursed Atepomarus Mail
description: Heavy armor of Atepomarus, horse God and leader of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Atepomarus, father to the three siblings, was set to ride three horses at once into battle. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

name: Cursed Autumna Crested Shield
description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

name: Cursed Belenus's Boots
description: Boots worn by Belenus, healing God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Belenus, of three siblings, spent his days attending the sick animals of Fomoria's fields. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

name: Cursed Boots

name: Gnome's Hat

name: Gobannos' Heavy Boots
description: Large boots of Gobannos, smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Gobannos constructed the crops' heavy gates and fences, ultimately containing Fomoria's curse within. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

name: Halberd

name: Hallowed Blade
description: A replica of Pumpkinhead's original sword. Aglovale, now know as Pumpkinhead, was enraptured in strange, but seasonal, magicks. Ultimately, this led him to insanity, now donning a pumpkin atop his mangled face.

name: Hallowed Candle
description: When lit, this mysterious candle draws stronger enemies to you for a limited time. Monsters defeated with this candle lit also give more experience.

name: Hallowed Monster Tome
description: A large tome of monster knowledge. Increases experience earned.

name: Hallowed Witch's Hat
description: The symbolic headwear of a nameless witch. It can protect one from status effects caused by the four basic elements.

name: Hammer
description: A large hammer suitable for crushing blows.

name: Handy Waystone
description: A stone imbued with the most helpful of magic. Use it to set a compass marker to inn quest monster locations.

name: Hard Leather Armor
description: Light armor reinforced with hardened leather. Offers fair protection from the elements.

name: Hard Leather Boots
description: Sturdy leather boots. Offers extra protection.

name: Hardened Steel
description: Steel, yet seemingly more durable than usual. Useful in upgrading stronger weapons.

name: Hardwood Lute
description: A talented bard's lute, playing it in battle may temporarily boost one's defenses.

name: Harpy's Feathers
description: Crude armor made of the remains of a harpy. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

name: Heart of Eos
description: The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.Titan Eos drove a mighty chariot powered by her mighty horses, the Phaethons. She searched the continents for tower materials, never having difficulty delivering them home.This piece will increase the power of your summons.

name: Heart of Oceanus
description: The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.Oceanus raised the great seas; crashing waves against the towers to test their might. He cooled the artifacts of Prometheus's Kiln, and forced the tower pieces into place with great tidal force.This augment allows one to break the maximum damage limit.

name: Heart of Prometheus
description: The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.Titan Prometheus operated a great kiln, molding stone, steel, and ortanite needed by the Titans into great pieces of the great towers. Ultimately, it is said his synthetic flesh became a kiln in itself.This piece increases one's resistance to status effects.

name: Heart of Selene
description: The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.Titan Selene had a certain way with the wildlife surrounding the towers. With the help of the birds, the trees, the hunters, and the prey -- she never felt deficient of help.This piece will allow your follower to make more intelligent decisions in battle.

name: Heart of Themis
description: The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.Titan Themis, of law and order, balanced the tower planes into place with her shoulders. A plane mustn't lean down to Balor, nor up to skies. A level floor bequeaths the next level floor.This piece allows one to recover both HP and Mana when taking Ward damage.

name: Heavy Arrows

name: Heavy Boots

name: Hel's Feathers
description: Poison tipped arrows of Hel, the shadowed rogue. The quiver offers additional slots for adornment and may protect one via Ward.

name: Hel's Garb

name: Hel's Veil
description: Headwear of Hel, the shadowed rogue. Wearing it may increase one's chance of landing a critical attack.

name: Helhest
description: The mighty bow of Hel. Its loosed arrows will light your path while exploring the world.

name: Hellfire Armor
description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

name: Imona's Slippers
description: Soft slippers of Imona, waking Goddess of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Imona was blessed with the fortune of a life of unneeded sleep. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

name: Incarnate Archistaff

description: Heavy armor made of iron.

name: Iron Hammer

name: Iron Helmet
description: An old iron helmet.

name: Iron Ring
description: A standard ring. You feel slightly stronger while wearing it. Slightly raises defense.

description: A simple shield of iron.

name: Ithra's Blade
description: Thin, cold blade of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.

name: Ithra's Staff
description: Thin, cold staff of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.

name: Jester's Outfit
description: Amusing outfit of a court jester. It increases gold earned.

name: Jewel of Arcana

name: Jewel of Avalon

name: Jewel of Celestria

name: Jewel of Creation

name: Jewel of Mana

When carried by summoners, this item will occasionally remove the casting time needed to summon beasts. Additionally, this item provides a great amount of Ward.

description: A rallying banner of a commanding Titan. It allows one to take the stance of Ophion, potentially dispersing any status effect received to your summoned minions.

name: Orcish Blade
description: Blunt blade of an Orcish warrior.

description: The universal remedy.

name: Phantom Blinders
description: Blinders often used to quell a Kelpie's restlessness. They increase dexterity and critical hit rate of those granted with extra concentration.

description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

name: Poison Dagger

description: An ageless golden shield capable of protecting one from petrification.

description: A mirrored shield. At the sacrifice of Ward, one can reflect on themselves and gain mana.

name: Pollux's Greataxe
description: Azure greataxe of Pollux, the Dioscuri berserker. Pollux and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.

name: Presents!
description: Gifts for you and me. Greatly boosts the chance for monsters to drop items. Additionally, you may find extra materials from defeating monsters in the world.

name: Racul Blade

name: Raging Bull's Eye

name: Ranger's Greatbow
description: Large, precise bow often carried by rangers of the wood.

name: Rapier

name: Raven Garb

name: Realm Boots
description: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

name: Realm Cowl
description: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

name: Realm Ore
description: A strange dark and warm ore refined by Balor mystics. It is useful in upgrading equipment of the exiled.

name: Realmcrystal
description: An oddly shaped crystal fallen from Olympia. Using it will allow one to return to another Realm without wait.

name: Realmspikes
description: Daggers carried by the Realmshifter. They have the increased chance of causing a critical hit.

name: Reaper's Robe
description: The blackened robe of Ankou, the henchman of Death. Slightly increases orns earned. It is most fitting for the most skilled of mages.

name: Reaper's Scythe
description: The followers of Ankou are fearsome, and this great scythe is their chosen weapon. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

name: Reaping Sickle
description: The followers of Apollyon are fearsome, and this great scythe is their chosen weapon. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

name: Red Crystal
description: An odd red crystal. Boosts HP when equipped.

name: Red Dagger
description: A small blade ideal for close quartered combat. This one in particular is imbued with fire.

name: Red Draconite
description: A chunk of fiery draconite. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

name: Red Eye of Kerberos
description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to cause an opponent to burn.

name: Red Feather
description: The feather of a Carrion Crow. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.

name: Red Gem
description: An odd red gem. Raises HP when equipped.

name: Red Pinion
description: A fallen feather of the great Phoenix. It can grant a piece of armor additional attributes when adorned upon it.

name: Refined Sugar

name: Riftguard Armor

name: Riftguard Helmet

description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, HP and Mana will be recovered by a percentage of the Ward damage taken.

name: Riftrogue Boots

description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

name: Ring of Day
description: Ring of the King of Light. It can protect one from having their defenses lowered.

name: Ring of Dusk

name: Ring of Night
description: Ring of the Queen of Darkness. It can protect one from having their physical or magical prowess decreased.

name: Ring of Restraint
description: A ring that inhibits growth, greatly reducing the amount of experience earned while slightly increasing orns, gold, and items found.

name: Ring of Sacrifice
description: A ring of certain evil. Wearing it attracts stronger monsters to you, but reduces your overall power.

name: Robe of the North
description: Magical attire of Nothren lords. It protects one from fire, the weakness of the Nothren people.

name: Robe of Wolves
description: Robe of a wolfman.

name: Rosa's Brooch
description: Lunar Catalyst of Rosa, fallen queen of the Enlightened.

name: Rosewood Lute
description: A talented bard's lute, playing it in battle may temporary boost one's stats.

name: Rotten Leaves
description: A clump of smelly old leaves.

name: Rusty Sword

name: Sabrina's Cowl
description: Headwear of Sabrina, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Sabrina and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

name: Sage's Cane
description: An old sage's cane.

name: Sala's Hood
description: Ivory hood of Sala, the High Elf.

name: Sala's Robe
description: Crimson robe of Sala, the High Elf.

name: Sandstorm

name: Saturn's Eye
description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

name: Scalestone

name: Scimitar
description: A short sword with a curved blade, designed for horseback combat.

name: Scorcher
description: This sword of the Inferno Knights is eternally ablaze.

name: Scroll
description: A scroll containing knowledge of basic magic. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward.

name: Scroll of Chaos
description: A scroll containing a terrible incantation that will turn the world crimson. Using this scroll will cause enemies of any habitat to show for a limited time, but may be more difficult to defeat.

name: Scroll of Earth
description: A scroll containing knowledge of earthen. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to rot to spells.

name: Scroll of Fire
description: A scroll containing knowledge of fire. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to burn to spells.

name: Scroll of Ice
description: A scroll containing knowledge of ice & water. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to freeze to spells.

name: Scroll of Lightning
description: A scroll containing knowledge of lightning. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to paralyze to spells.

name: Scroll of Poison
description: A scroll containing knowledge of poison arts. It improves one's magic at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to poison to spells.

name: Scythe
description: A large tool quite suitable for cutting grass.

name: Sea Axe
description: An axe enchanted with the power of the raging sea.

name: Sea Bass
description: A medium sized fish, often seen in larger bodies of water.

name: Second Horseman's Staff

name: Seeker's Candle
description: When lit, this candle is said to draw near monsters that you have accepted a quest for.

name: Sempre Forte
description: A relic of Apollyon's less destructive years.

description: Masterly smithed chest armor of Sequana, river Goddess and leader of the Fomorian house of Autumna. The oldest of her sisters, Sequana was a deity of grace and fortune. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

The trials of scaling mountains is evident in these weapons, as they grant additional gold, orns, and experience when defeating monsters. Additionally, they will increase the rewards when completing quests or memory hunts.

description: A rare piece of waterstone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

name: Whetstone
description: A stone of quartz often used in the sharpening of blades. Using it will freely upgrade your equipped weapon to level 2.

name: Whisper
description: A sharp trusty dagger, carried in your off-hand. It gives your attacks the chance to cause an opponent to bleed, at the expense of Ward.

name: White Sheet
description: A simple white sheet that one could use to mock a spirit. It protects one from falling asleep in battle.

name: Willow Tree Branch
description: A large tree branch carried by Eistla, a great giant. Its ability can grant one Eistla's stance, doubling hybrid damage at the expense of your companions' prowess.

name: Wintara Crested Shield
description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

name: Wisp Staff
description: Staff imbued with the power of a wisp.

name: Witch's Archistaff
description: Old, decrepit, dark archistaff of a powerful witch. Slightly boosts experience earned.

name: Witch's Hat
description: The symbolic headwear of Carman, the banished witch.

name: Witch's Scroll
description: A scroll containing knowledge of a Witch's arts. It improves one's mana at the sacrifice of Ward, while adding a chance to inflict many status effects to spells.

name: Witchstone
description: A strange stone crafted by a great witch.

name: Wolf's Blood
description: What a strange substance. What could it ever be for?

name: Wolfbane
description: A magical blade representing the unrelenting force of Fenrir the wolf. It can temporarily decrease your opponent's defense upon use.

name: Wolfskin
description: Light armor crafted of a wolf's remains.

name: Wolven Tower Shield
description: A gigantic shield often used to protect one from the wildest of wolves. It offers additional defense at the expense of power.

name: Wood
description: A solid piece of wood. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

name: Woodblade
description: A mystical sword made of hardened wood.

name: Wooden Shield
description: A simple shield made of hardened wood.

name: Wooden Staff
description: A mage's staff crafted of enchanted wood.

name: Woodland Staff
description: A mystical staff made of hardened wood.

name: World Eater
description: Chapter VIII: Bashe, the World Eater -- hungry as ever -- drove his mouth downwards, piercing the foundation of the Agathodaemon. His broadsword is filled with craters as well, making it well suitable for adornment.

name: Wyvern Armor
description: An exotic chest guard made of wyvern skin.

name: Wyvern Blades
description: Crude blades made from the talons of a wyvern. These blades can cause your opponent to bleed.

name: Wyvern Boots
description: Exotic boots made of wyvern skin.

name: Wyvern Chestmail
description: An exotic chest guard made of wyvern skin.

name: Wyvern Cowl
description: An exotic cowl made of wyvern skin.

name: Wyvern Helmet
description: An exotic helmet made of wyvern skin.

name: Wyvern Hood
description: An exotic hood made of wyvern skin.

name: Wyvern Leggings
description: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of wyvern skin.

name: Wyvern Mage's Boots
description: Exotic boots made of wyvern skin.

name: Wyvern Robe
description: An exotic robe made of wyvern skin.

name: X Elixir
description: Recovers 5000 health points and 5000 mana.

name: X Health Potion
description: Recovers 5000 health points.

name: X Mana Potion
description: Recovers 5000 mana.

name: Xi Olympia Archistaff
description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

name: Xi Olympia Boots
description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

name: Xi Olympia Warbow
description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

name: Xi Olympia Warsword
description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

name: Yellow Eye of Kerberos
description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to paralyze an opponent.

name: Yeti Coat
description: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.

name: Yeti Mightycoat
description: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.

name: Yeti Overcoat
description: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.

name: Ymir Agathodaemon Hammer
description: Chapter IV: The Agathodaemon, destructive as always, crumbled the tops of the coiled stone into earth and soil. He layed this soil over Vritra's wings, forming the ground as we know it. The Agathodaemon's hammer can crush the Ward of your opponent.

name: Ymir Brilliant Feathers
description: Chapter IX: Quetzalcoatl flew high, shedding her feathers in the air. As the sun melted her feathers, they filled the craters Bashe left behind, forming our lakes and rivers. Her remaining feathers form this scythe, and it will better align you with your faction's might.

name: Ymir Cliffside Cuirass
description: Chapter VI: Illuyanka then raised walls of stone to frame this new land from the raging seas and winds. The cliffs and shores can be seen from afar, and her mighty armor will surely make one feel as they are made of the cliffs themselves. It will occasionally protect you from hits that take 100% of your maximum HP.

name: Ymir Coiled Shield
description: Chapter I: These lands were created by the Great Dragons: 8 deities formed by the wants and wishes of humankind. Lotan was the first to mend the earth, coiling rock from the planet's core to create the foundation of life. Her shield will greatly decrease the damage taken when defending in battle.

name: Ymir Staff of Zaltys
description: Chapter V: Zaltys never did like the Agathodaemon, but understood that she needed the soil for life. Zaltys laid seed to the soil, sprouting the foliage that lets us breath our air. Her staff represents life, and will allow you to recover HP each turn in battle.

name: Ymir Vritra Charm
description: Chapter III: Vritra was next to forge these lands, laying her immutable wings upon the coiled rock. This formed a basin of strength for life to grow atop the molten core of this planet. Her charm may occasionally protect you from status effects while granting immunity to Paralyze, Stun, and Petrification.

name: Ymir World Eater
description: Chapter VIII: Bashe, the World Eater -- hungry as ever -- drove his mouth downwards, piercing the foundation of the Agathodaemon. His broadsword is filled with craters as well, making it well suitable for adornment.

name: Yokai's Staff
description: A staff of the revered Yokai. It may lower an opponent's magical defenses.

name: Zeta Myrddin
description: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.

name: Zeta Myrddin Cloak
description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

name: Zeta Myrddin Cowl
description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.
